item.title: How extreme is it? An introduction to extreme statistics
item.description: It recent years, it has became very obvious that extreme weather is a clear and present danger. On a personal level, just last week, my house in Melbourne was without power for more than 8 hours, due to a large-scale blackout in Victoria caused by strong winds and high temperatures. More shockingly, Two days ago, Carnarvon in Western Australia experienced a 49.9Â°C day, which is said to be the world’s hottest temperature recorded this year.
